birth_place.zh-cn: 山西省五台县东冶镇槐荫村
birth_place.en: Huaiyin Village, Dongye Town, Wutai County, Shanxi Province

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，曾任中国共产党黑龙江省委员会书记、中共中央组织部副部长、中国共产党中央顾问委员会秘书长及当代中国研究所所长。
description.en: A political figure of the People's Republic of China, he served as the Secretary of the CPC Heilongjiang Provincial Committee, Deputy Head of the Organization Department of the CPC Central Committee, Secretary-General of the CPC Central Advisory Commission, and Director of the Institute of Contemporary China Studies.

nodes.id: 中国共产党黑龙江省委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党黑龙江省委员会
en: Heilongjiang Provincial Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在黑龙江省的领导机关。
description.en: The leading body of the Communist Party of China in Heilongjiang Province.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，曾任中共黑龙江省委第一书记，是李力安的前任。
description.en: A political figure of the People's Republic of China, who served as the First Secretary of the CPC Heilongjiang Provincial Committee and was Li Li'an's predecessor.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，曾任中共黑龙江省委书记，是李力安的继任者。
description.en: A political figure of the People's Republic of China, who served as the Secretary of the CPC Heilongjiang Provincial Committee and was Li Li'an's successor.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，在李力安担任中共黑龙江省委书记期间是其副手。
description.en: A political figure of the People's Republic of China, who served as a deputy to Li Li'an when Li was the Secretary of the CPC Heilongjiang Provincial Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，在李力安担任中共黑龙江省委书记期间是其副手。
description.en: A political figure of the People's Republic of China, who served as a deputy to Li Li'an when Li was the Secretary of the CPC Heilongjiang Provincial Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The founding and sole ruling party of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国山西省忻州市下辖的县，是李力安的出生地。
description.en: A county under the jurisdiction of Xinzhou, Shanxi province, China, and the birthplace of Li Li'an.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的首都，是李力安的逝世地。
description.en: The capital of the People's Republic of China, and the place of Li Li'an's death.

nodes.id: 中国共产党中央顾问委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央顾问委员会

description.zh-cn: 1982年至1992年间存在的中国共产党中央组织的最高顾问机构。
description.en: The highest advisory body of the Central Organization of the Communist Party of China that existed between 1982 and 1992.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的国史研究机构。
description.en: A research institution for the national history of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 由学生发起的社会运动，李力安早年曾参加。
description.en: A social movement initiated by students, in which Li Li'an participated in his early years.

description.zh-cn: 中国抗日战争时期在山西活动的抗日组织。
description.en: An anti-Japanese organization active in Shanxi during the Second Sino-Japanese War.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国成立前后的行政区划，此节点特指其党委机构。
description.en: An administrative region before and after the founding of the People's Republic of China, this node specifically refers to its Party committee structure.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国成立前后的行政区划，此节点特指其地委机构。
description.en: An administrative region before and after the founding of the People's Republic of China, this node specifically refers to its prefectural committee structure.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国陕西省下辖的地级市。此节点特指其历史上的地委机构。
description.en: A prefecture-level city in Shaanxi Province, People's Republic of China. This node specifically refers to its historical prefectural party committee.

nodes.id: 中国共产党中央委员会组织部

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会组织部
en: Organization Department of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会的职能部门之一，主管党组织建设和干部人事工作。
description.en: One of the functional departments of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China, responsible for party organization building and personnel management.

description.zh-cn: 1959年至1960年发生在中国河南省信阳地区的大饥荒事件。
description.en: A major famine that occurred in the Xinyang region of Henan Province, China, from 1959 to 1960.

description.zh-cn: 由毛泽东发起和领导的在中国发生的政治运动。
description.en: A political movement in China launched and led by Mao Zedong.

nodes.id: 中国共产党哈尔滨市委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党哈尔滨市委员会
en: Harbin Municipal Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在哈尔滨市的领导机关。
description.en: The leading body of the Communist Party of China in Harbin City.

nodes.id: 中央整党工作指导委员会

zh-cn: 中央整党工作指导委员会
en: Central Commission for Guiding Party Consolidation

description.zh-cn: 负责指导1983年至1987年中国共产党整党工作的机构。
description.en: The body responsible for guiding the party consolidation work of the Communist Party of China from 1983 to 1987.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，是李力安在中共哈尔滨市委第一书记职位上的前任。
description.en: A political figure of the People's Republic of China, predecessor to Li Li'an as the First Secretary of the CPC Harbin Municipal Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，是李力安在中共哈尔滨市委第一书记职位上的继任者。
description.en: A political figure of the People's Republic of China, successor to Li Li'an as the First Secretary of the CPC Harbin Municipal Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，是李力安在中共中央顾问委员会秘书长职位上的前任。
description.en: A political figure of the People's Republic of China, predecessor to Li Li'an as the Secretary-General of the CPC Central Advisory Commission.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，是李力安在当代中国研究所所长职位上的继任者。
description.en: A political figure of the People's Republic of China, successor to Li Li'an as the Director of the Institute of Contemporary China Studies.

description.zh-cn: 15岁时加入中国共产党，从事党的地下工作。
description.en: Joined the Communist Party of China at the age of 15 and engaged in underground party work.

description.zh-cn: 14岁时在川至中学参加学生运动。
description.en: Participated in the student movement at Chuanzhi Middle School at the age of 14.

description.zh-cn: 1938年参加牺盟会。
description.en: Joined the Sacrifice League in 1938.

description.zh-cn: 1948年任中共两郧地委副书记。
description.en: In 1948, he served as the Deputy Secretary of the CPC Liangyun Prefectural Committee.

description.zh-cn: 两郧地委隶属于陕南区党委。
description.en: The Liangyun Prefectural Committee was subordinate to the Shannan District Party Committee.

position.en: Deputy Secretary and Head of the Organization Department

description.zh-cn: 1949年安康解放后，改任中共安康地委副书记兼组织部长。
description.en: After the liberation of Ankang in 1949, he was reassigned as the Deputy Secretary and Head of the Organization Department of the CPC Ankang Prefectural Committee.

relationships.target: 中国共产党中央委员会组织部

description.zh-cn: 1960年任中共中央组织部调配处处长。
description.en: In 1960, he served as the Director of the Allocation Department of the Organization Department of the CPC Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 在担任中共中央组织部调配处处长期间，负责解决信阳事件。
description.en: While serving as the Director of the Allocation Department of the Organization Department of the CPC Central Committee, he was responsible for resolving the Xinyang Incident.

relationships.target: 中国共产党中央委员会组织部

description.zh-cn: 1964年8月任中共中央组织部副部长。
description.en: In August 1964, he was appointed Deputy Minister of the Organization Department of the CPC Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 在“文化大革命”初期受迫害，下放“五七”干校劳动，直至1972年7月恢复工作。
description.en: He was persecuted at the beginning of the 'Cultural Revolution' and sent down to a 'May Seventh Cadre School' for labor until his work was restored in July 1972.

relationships.target: 中国共产党黑龙江省委员会

description.zh-cn: 恢复工作后，任中共黑龙江省委书记（当时设有第一书记）。
description.en: After resuming work, he served as Secretary of the CPC Heilongjiang Provincial Committee (when the position of First Secretary existed).

relationships.target: 中国共产党黑龙江省委员会

description.zh-cn: 1981年，任中共黑龙江省委第二书记。
description.en: In 1981, he served as the Second Secretary of the CPC Heilongjiang Provincial Committee.

relationships.target: 中国共产党哈尔滨市委员会

description.zh-cn: 1981年任中共哈尔滨市委第一书记。
description.en: In 1981, he served as the First Secretary of the CPC Harbin Municipal Committee.

relationships.target: 中国共产党黑龙江省委员会

description.zh-cn: 1983年7月，任中共黑龙江省委书记。
description.en: In July 1983, he became the Secretary of the CPC Heilongjiang Provincial Committee.

description.zh-cn: 李力安接替杨易辰担任中共黑龙江省委书记。
description.en: Li Li'an succeeded Yang Yichen as the Secretary of the CPC Heilongjiang Provincial Committee.

description.zh-cn: 孙维本接替李力安担任中共黑龙江省委书记。
description.en: Sun Weiben succeeded Li Li'an as the Secretary of the CPC Heilongjiang Provincial Committee.

description.zh-cn: 在李力安担任中共黑龙江省委书记期间，陈雷是其副手之一。
description.en: While Li Li'an was Secretary of the CPC Heilongjiang Provincial Committee, Chen Lei was one of his deputies.

description.zh-cn: 在李力安担任中共黑龙江省委书记期间，侯捷是其副手之一。
description.en: While Li Li'an was Secretary of the CPC Heilongjiang Provincial Committee, Hou Jie was one of his deputies.

relationships.target: 中央整党工作指导委员会

description.zh-cn: 1986年任中央整党工作指导委员会办公室主任。
description.en: In 1986, he was appointed Director of the Office of the Central Commission for Guiding Party Consolidation.

relationships.target: 中国共产党中央顾问委员会

description.zh-cn: 1987年当选为中顾委委员，并担任秘书长。
description.en: Elected as a member of the Central Advisory Commission in 1987 and served as its Secretary-General.

description.zh-cn: 1993年至2001年任当代中国研究所所长。
description.en: Served as Director of the Institute of Contemporary China Studies from 1993 to 2001.

description.zh-cn: 李力安接替文敏生担任中共哈尔滨市委第一书记。
description.en: Li Li'an succeeded Wen Minsheng as the First Secretary of the CPC Harbin Municipal Committee.

description.zh-cn: 王钊接替李力安担任中共哈尔滨市委第一书记。
description.en: Wang Zhao succeeded Li Li'an as the First Secretary of the CPC Harbin Municipal Committee.

description.zh-cn: 李力安接替荣高棠担任中共中央顾问委员会秘书长。
description.en: Li Li'an succeeded Rong Gaotang as the Secretary-General of the CPC Central Advisory Commission.

description.zh-cn: 朱佳木接替李力安担任当代中国研究所所长。
description.en: Zhu Jiamu succeeded Li Li'an as the Director of the Institute of Contemporary China Studies.

description.zh-cn: 李力安出生于山西省五台县东冶镇槐荫村。
description.en: Li Li'an was born in Huaiyin Village, Dongye Town, Wutai County, Shanxi Province.
